column5: 2 of the 4 - 18" Smallies caught Drop Shotting Slammers, we saw a couple dozen Smallies still on Beds   Fred's PB 17" Smallie      As Fred set the hook on a Crankbait & said fish on, I set the hook with a Tube & we ended up with a pair of these about the same size lol, his biggest fish ever    Tight Lines SBK
nice fish.....where abouts were you fishing?
I got this one SBK, Canada is where he was!
nice going Richard - nothing like putting a bud onto a PB and slamming some beauty fish at the same time
Nice Richard.  Great fish, but love the shirt.
Some nice bass Richard, congrat's on a good day!
Movember shirt 94.5 The Bull put on a Show at Grand Bend & my son played the Bass for one song, all merch proceeds went to Prostate Cancer Fundraiser, Tight Lines SBK

I happened to be in goderich at the Maitland River(not fishing-out for a drive). What a zoo! Judging by the full stringers of bass the fishing was good. Too bad guys were keeping fish around 12 inches. I wish they would stick to the 2-3 lb fish and let the bigger and smaller fish go...
Cool report with some nice smallies. Ya don't see many smallie reports from Huron.
